headline: 2 No-Brainer Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy Right Now
summary: Warren Buffett is retiring from Berkshire Hathaway, but the portfolio of stocks he built still offers insights into great investment opportunities.  Amazon continues to dominate U.S. e-commerce and cloud computing.  American Express has been a Buffett favorite for decades and looks well priced right now.
